r.s: Extension for IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby
r.d: This extension supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: Add option to force column names to lower case or upper case: * pass 'DB2_ATTR_CASE' => DB2_CASE_LOWER for lower case * pass 'DB2_ATTR_CASE' => DB2_CASE_UPPER for upper case * pass 'DB2_ATTR_CASE' => DB2_CASE_NATURAL for natural case (default)
